item.title: Stremio VR Hotfix
item.description: We released a hotfix for the new Meta Quest app to resolve an issue where the app could crash when opening the streams page for some users. Other minor changes were also included, such as fixing an overlapping issue in the seasons selector and removing the Unity splash screen. Happy watching!
